meanings.sent1: The ameliorative effects of the new medicine were evident in her quick recovery.
meanings.sent2: The ameliorative measures taken by the government helped to boost the economy.
meanings.sent3: His ameliorative attitude towards challenges always inspired his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The ameliorative power of education can transform lives and open doors to opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The ameliorative impact of kindness can create a ripple effect of positivity in the community.
